options.text: Child was born alive, but died
Child was born alive, but they have a problem (i.e. disability, respiratory issues, etc.)

fields.text: Manage the condition as per standard guidelines

v_required.err: Please enter date the woman miscarried.

fields.label: HIV exposure risk of the newborn(s)

fields.text: Conduct birth HIV testing, provide triple ARV prophylaxis for 6-weeks followed by monoprophylaxis for the next 6-weeks, care and monitor the newborn as per guidelines until the end of exposure.

v_required.err: Please enter date the woman delivered

fields.hint: The place the mother gave birth

fields.label: Who helped the mother with a home delivery?

options.text: She gave birth with the help of a family member/friend/neighbor
She gave birth with the help of a traditional midwife

fields.label: The mother gave birth in a health facility. Who accompanied the mother to the health facility?

options.text: She was accompanied by family member(s)
She was accompanied by a traditional midwife
She was accompanied by other people
She was accompanied by the CHW

value.text:
APGAR score, Abnormal: {apgar_score}.

v_min.err: The weight must be equal or greater than 0.5 (KGs)

value.text: Provide BCG vaccination to the infant at the first Postnatal care visit or as soon as the BCG vaccine will be available. BCG should not be provided beyond 12-months of infant age

value.hint: Reason as to why the BCG vaccination was not given

value.text: Provide OPV 0 vaccination to the infant at the first Postnatal care visit or as soon as the OPV 0 vaccine will be available. OPV 0 should not be provided beyond 14 days
